i need the driver, how do i install that ppa
you can run software sources and add the ppa lane as an extra repo, then when you close it you can run: sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx-190

ahh ok got it
you can do it at command line with: sudo add-apt-repository ppa:nvidia-vdpau/ppa
you can then run: sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx-190
